title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Outline project goals, desired features, functionalities, user interface, and compatibility requirements.

title: Design User Interface (UI) and Experience (UX)
description: Create wireframes, mockups, and user flow for the device interface.

title: Develop Device Hardware Specifications
description: Specify the hardware components required for dream recording, including the camera, storage, power source, and microphone.

title: Design Dream Data Recording Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm for recording dream data during sleep.

title: Develop Mobile App for Dream Recorder Control and Playback
description: Create a mobile app that allows users to control the device, play back recorded dreams, and share their experiences.

title: Develop Dream Data Analysis Tool
description: Create a tool for analyzing recorded dream data, providing insights and identifying patterns in the subconscious.

title: Implement Device Prototypes
description: Construct working prototypes of the device based on defined hardware specifications.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Tests
description: Test individual components and the overall functionality of the device.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
description: Test the device with end-users to gather feedback and identify any issues.
dependencies: Develop Mobile App for Dream Recorder Control and Playback

title: Prepare Device Documentation
description: Create user manuals, technical documentation, and troubleshooting guides.

title: Prepare Marketing Materials and Launch Campaign
description: Design promotional materials, create a launch plan, and execute the marketing campaign for the DreamRecorder.
